successes.title: Orcs Must Die! The Boardgame
successes.description: Orcs Must Die! The Board Game! is a co-op and vs. tower defense style board game.  Buy our game! Orcs MUST die, after all!

Pledges.description: MINION OF THE UNCHAINED.  Orcs Must Die! The Boardgame: Unchained Edition, plus all applicable Stretch Goals.

DIGITAL REWARDS: 
Orcs Must Die 1
Orcs Must Die 2
Orcs Must Die Unchained closed beta key
Unique skin for Orcs Must Die Unchained
Delivery of Digital items shortly after campaign ends.
Shipping charged after campaign ends (see Shipping section for full details)
MINION OF THE ORDER.  Orcs Must Die! The Boardgame: Order Edition, plus all applicable Stretch Goals.
